author: cnbc.com
title: Rocky Mountain Dealerships Inc., Recognized as Largest Distributor of Case IH Agricultural Equipment in North America, to Host Investor Event on May 30th to Launch Five Year Growth Plan
text:
CALGARY, Alberta--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Rocky Mountain Dealerships Inc. (TSX:RME, and hereinafter " RME "), Canada's largest agriculture equipment dealer, today announced that Case IH, a global leader in agricultural equipment, has recognized RME as the largest volume dealer in North America for Case IH agriculture equipment for 2017.
“We are proud to be recognized by Case IH as their largest volume dealership in North America,” said Garrett Ganden, President & Chief Executive Officer of RME. “This is the result of our team’s continued focus on customer service, integration and consolidation within our market. Our team’s approach, combined with one of the best agriculture equipment brands globally, has allowed us to grow our mutual share of the market.”
“It is evident that RME has a strong relationship with their customers by their sales performance as the top volume dealer in North America. RME’s focus on relationships is not only with customers, but also with Case IH,” said Scott Harris, Case IH Vice President, North America. “This builds strong loyalty throughout the lifetime of our customers. We take great pride in our partnership with RME.”
RME Five Year Growth Plan to be Launched at Investor Event on May 30 th
RME also announced today that it will hold an investor event to launch its five-year growth plan on Wednesday, May 30th, 2018, at 8:30 a.m. Mountain Time (" MT ") (10:30 a.m. Eastern Time (" ET ")).
To listen to the live webcast and watch the presentation please use the following link:
http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1673028-1/CE388F1198197D7CF12D038E0EF5C7AF
Within 24 hours of the event, the webcast will be available for replay at the link above until May 29, 2019.
Those interested in participating in the question and answer portion of the event by phone may do so by calling 1-866-521-4909 (toll free) or (647) 427-2311.
About Rocky Mountain Dealerships (TSX:RME)
RME is Canada's largest agriculture equipment dealer with branches located throughout Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba. Through its dealer network, RME sells, rents, and leases new and used agriculture equipment and offers product support and finance to its customers.
Additional information about RME is available at www.rockymtn.com and on SEDAR at www.sedar.com .
